- `RUN_ID` / Run ID:
- Step ID:
- Attempt ID:

## Contract Reference

- Contract / StepPack path:
- Acceptance criteria version:

## Gate Summary

- Gate Summary path (`gate_summary.md` or equivalent):
- Required commands status:
- Evidence paths (`.artifacts/...`):

## Scope Review

- Allowed paths changed only: [ ] Yes [ ] No
- Forbidden paths untouched: [ ] Yes [ ] No

## Notes

- Risks / follow-up:
